3-2-11.name: You
3-2-11.stillRaining: The rain keeps pouring so heavily... How can I make it calm down?

3-2-12.rainDoll: Maybe... try tapping on the rain doll?

4-1-5.goodJob: You’ve been so brave... having the courage to make a decisive step about something you’ve been uncertain about for so long

4-1-6.encounter: facing your fears is never easy,

4-1-7.foundAWay: but somehow, you’ve found a way to overcome every challenge that’s come your way.

4-1-8.dontKnow: Do you remember? This isn’t the first rainstorm you’ve faced.

4-1-9.raining: Rain comes every year, and sometimes it even falls unexpectedly, but you’ve always made it through.

4-1-10.whenYouAreChild: And when you were a child... you used to run and play in the rain with so much joy,

4-1-11.likeRain: as if the rain could never scare you, not even for a moment.

4-1-12.soAnother: So this time, it’s just another moment when the rain has come to visit.

4-1-13.remember: And remember, Just like every time before—this, too, shall pass.

4-1-14.dontKnow: I don’t know if anyone has ever told you this...

4-1-15.wantYouToKnow: but I need you to know that, despite everything you’ve been through, you’ve blossomed and grown into something truly beautiful. So proud of you. 😊

6-1-1.sometimes: Sometimes life has its own timing. Look at this fruit—we shook the tree like crazy, but it just dropped on its own in the end when its time comes.

p1.s1: A tree rises slowly, in silence it grows,
p1.s2: Its roots dig deep where no eye knows.
p1.s3: In sunlight it basks, in storms it sways,
p1.s5: Like life, it stretches, reaching skyward high,
p1.s6: Yet anchored in earth where truths lie.
p1.s7: Through winter’s grip and summer’s gleam,
p1.s8: A tree holds steady in every dream.

p1.s1: "To you, who have found yourself once
p1.s2: again, we have a keepsake to commemorate
p1.s3: this journey that we’d like to give you."

6-3-2.butBefore:
But before you open the gift, we’d like you
to take a moment to reflect on your
feelings right now, after navigating through
the changing seasons of your mind.

6-3-3.after:
After gaining insight into your goals,
inspirations, and fears.

6-3-4.howDo:
How do you feel about this journey?
1 Not satisfied at all - 10 Extremely happy

6-3-5.andAt:
And at this moment, how much stress or
worry do you feel in your mind?
1 being the least - 10 being the most

6-3-6.couldYou:
Could you share the reason
behind your rating?

6-3-7.iSee:
I see now. So, this is how you’ve been
feeling. But no matter how you feel right
now, the most important thing is that
you’ve come to understand your own
feelings.

6-3-8.feeling:
Feeling lost might seem scary, but we all
experience that sometimes.
You might feel lost again in the future,

6-3-9.butLet:
but let today’s journey be the start of
rediscovering yourself.

6-3-10.iHope:
I hope you’ll take time to reflect on your
feelings and not lose yourself so often.

1.Inspiring flame: You are entering the early phase of this season. The wind that once threatened to extinguish your flame, leaving it on the verge of fading forever, is now shifting. The fire of inspiration is being rekindled once again. The life goals that once seemed blurry are now coming into focus, as if a lens has just been adjusted. Do not cling to the past—you can always start anew. And you are now ready to surpass your limits and reach something far greater than before.
1.Trophies and Triumphs: You are entering the early phase of this season. Perhaps you have felt as if you must sprint to reach the finish line, or struggle tirelessly to become a better version of yourself. Yet, regardless of how your past season unfolded, new beginnings are always possible—and a fresh season has arrived. May your determination and your true self blossom beautifully in the season to come!
1.Heart & Home: You are entering the beginning of this season. In the past, you may have had to constantly add firewood to keep the hearth burning, searching for warmth for yourself. But no matter how your previous seasons have unfolded, new beginnings are always possible. The new season has arrived—may your dedication and love bloom beautifully in the days ahead.
1.Life Canvas: You are stepping into the beginning of this season. As you start to recognize the importance of listening to your inner self, you will gain the confidence to draw the first stroke on your life’s canvas. No matter how imperfect or messy your past paintings may have been, they were never meaningless. Nothing is ever completely perfect, and imperfection is not a flaw. The real question is—are you ready to create a new masterpiece, one even more beautiful than before?
1.Refilled Heart: You are entering the early phase of this season. Perhaps you have experienced moments of feeling distant from those you cherish, or felt as if you never had time for yourself. But regardless of how your past season unfolded, new beginnings are always possible—and a new season has arrived. May your garden of love and self flourish beautifully in the coming days!
1.Ribbons and Paper Boxes: You are entering the beginning of this season. Perhaps ribbons were once torn, and boxes left empty, but no matter what your past seasons have been, new beginnings are always possible. The new season has arrived—may your love and kindness bloom and spread beautifully in the days ahead.

2.Inspiring flame: You are in the middle of this season, striving relentlessly toward your goals. The challenges you never thought you would overcome are now behind you. You’ve made it this far—well done. Hold onto your beliefs, and nothing will be able to stop you. Every drop of sweat and every ounce of effort you’ve put in is about to shine in the near future. Don’t give up now—you are getting closer.
2.Trophies and Triumphs: Now, you find yourself in the midst of the season. You have journeyed far, overcoming stumbles and setbacks to reach your goals. Even if moments of despair have touched you, trust in your unwavering determination and the strides you continue to make. Rest assured, your moment to flourish is closer than you think!
2.Heart & Home: You are halfway through this season, having experienced both warmth and joy. Though there may have been moments that didn’t go as planned, believe in your perseverance and love. The moment when everything fully blossoms is not far out of reach.
2.Life Canvas: You are now in the middle of this season, having journeyed through both joys and hardships. These moments have shaped who you are, like torn paper transformed into lessons that strengthen your spirit. Keep nurturing your dreams and refining your vision—step by step, you are getting closer to your goals. Just a little further, and the success waiting ahead will become your reality.
2.Refilled Heart: In the midst of this season, you have shared joyful memories with others while also facing challenges in your relationships. Even during moments of discouragement, trust in the bonds you have formed; embrace yourself and those dear to you tightly, for your time to bloom is surely within reach!
2.Ribbons and Paper Boxes: You are in the heart of this season, having already experienced the warmth of giving and receiving love. Though there may have been moments that didn’t go as expected, trust in your generous heart. The moment for your full bloom is not far from reach.

3.Inspiring flame: You have reached the peak of this season. The bonfire of inspiration within you is now burning at its fullest. You can feel an unstoppable energy flowing through you. The knowledge and skills you have accumulated will become the essential tools to create something extraordinary. The goals that once seemed out of reach are drawing closer to reality. Stay focused on what’s ahead and give it your all. No matter what challenges come your way—whether good or bad—you will handle them with resilience. Just a little longer now, you are almost there.
3.Trophies and Triumphs: You are in the blooming phase of this season. With clear goals and resolute determination, every obstacle becomes merely a stepping stone. With a heart brimming with vitality, every action propels the tree of your success to bloom and bear fruit as you have long awaited. Just a little while longer!
3.Heart & Home: You are now in the season of full bloom. Your goals and vision are clear, and every challenge has only been a stepping stone for your growth. With a heart full of inspiration, each step you take brings your dreams and love to life. Just a little longer—your time is near.
3.Life Canvas: You have reached the peak of this season. Now that you truly understand your source of inspiration, do not waste time focusing on obstacles—you have overcome them time and time again. Move forward with determination and belief in yourself. The dream you have carefully crafted is about to take shape beautifully, just like colors coming together on the canvas of life. You are the artist of your own masterpiece—one that is uniquely yours and unlike any other.
3.Refilled Heart: Now, in the blossoming phase of this season, you have an abundance of love ready to be shared with yourself and your loved ones. Every obstacle you face becomes merely a stepping stone. With a heart overflowing with care, each step you take nourishes the tree of your relationships, allowing it to bloom and bear the fruits you have long awaited. Just a little while longer!
3.Ribbons and Paper Boxes: You are now in the season of full bloom. Your heart overflows with love and generosity, and every challenge has only been a stepping stone toward something greater. With a soul filled with inspiration, each act of kindness brings love to life. Just a little longer—your time is near.

p1.s1: The experience you see on your screen… is just
p1.s6: and feel every beautifully crafted element
p1.s7: come to life. Discover what can never truly

p1.s2: An interactive exhibition with a journey to
p1.s4: ever-changing seasons and time, for every
p1.s5: shade and feeling in each season brings their own unique beauty.
p1.s6: “The seasons are like the events that pass through our lives—eventually flowing away with time. They bring a mix of emotions: some good, some bad, all intertwined. But no matter what, happiness and joy will eventually find its way back.
p1.s7: Sometimes, even after an event has passed, lingering feelings remain. Soul Seasons invites you to embark on a journey through five seasons of the soul. Pause for a moment, explore the feelings within, reflect on the stories and emotions that may have been overlooked in previous seasons, without ever giving yourself a chance to explore, or neglecting the true emotions within your heart.
p1.s8: No matter which season your heart finds itself in—whether it's the rain that clouds your heart, the vibrant bloom of spring, the lonely chill of winter, or the fading whispers of autumn—in the end, you can fully embrace every emotion that colors your essence, be it joy or sorrow.
p1.s9: If you're ready to explore the changing seasons of your soul, let your heart wander freely through the skies, rain, winds, and sunlight within.”
